label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_030
content:
## 2026-02-01 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /dns-query: REQUESTS req | p50: 16ms p95: 40ms p99: 60ms | err: 0.07% (18 errors) | success: 99.93%
- /zone-transfer: REQUESTS req | p50: 560ms p95: 1315ms p99: 2000ms | err: 1.1% (45 errors) | success: 98.9%
- /ttl-change: REQUESTS req | p50: 300ms p95: 900ms p99: 1500ms | err: 0.0% (0 errors) | success: 100%
- /dnssec-sign: REQUESTS req | p50: 20ms p95: 50ms p99: 70ms | err: 0.0% (0 errors) | success: 100%
- /health-check: REQUESTS req | p50: 10ms p95: 25ms p99: 40ms | err: 0.0% (0 errors) | success: 100%
- /change-request: REQUESTS req | p50: 15ms p95: 35ms p99: 50ms | err: 0.0% (0 errors) | success: 100%

### Infrastructure
- bind-master-01: CPU 29% | Mem 62% | Disk 82% | Conns: 1275 | Net: 86/120 Mbps
- bind-slave-02: CPU 22% | Mem 50% | Disk 60% | Conns: 1080 | Net: 64/82 Mbps
- cloud-dns-sync-01: CPU 51% | Mem 69% | Disk 58% | Conns: N/A | Net: 110/152 Mbps
- signer-01: CPU 35% | Mem 74% | Disk 68% | Conns: N/A | Net: 16/22 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-dns-queries: active 120 | idle 30 | waiting 5 | exhaustion 0 | max 200 | avg_wait 12ms
- pool-zone-transfers: active 15 | idle 5 | waiting 2 | exhaustion 0 | max 25 | avg_wait 20ms
- pool-ttl-changes: active 8 | idle 2 | waiting 1 | exhaustion 0 | max 15 | avg_wait 10ms
- pool-dnssec-sign: active 3 | idle 1 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 5 | avg_wait 8ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 89.0% | Bandwidth: 2.5 Gbps | Origin requests: 12,000

### Alerts
- [INFO] DNSSEC signature validation event on signer-01: bogus_validation_events: 1
- [WARNING] High propagation delay on cloud edge sites: avg 66s | p95 158s
- [INFO] Zone transfer success rate: 98.9% (axfr), 99.0% (ixfr)
- [INFO] TTL changes applied: 79 records across 12 zones
- [INFO] DNS queries peak QPS: 69,000
- [INFO] DNS queries average QPS: 25,800
- [WARNING] Stale answer percentage: 0.3%
- [INFO] DNSSEC zones signed: 100
- [INFO] DNSSEC signature refreshes: 128
- [INFO] Propagation to cloud edge sites: 36 sites, avg 66s, p95 158s
- [INFO] Change requests processed: 8, all applied successfully
- [INFO] TTL harmonization completed for 12 zones
- [INFO] Start-of-month migration push: 16 zones onboarded, including complex SRV and CAA sets
- [INFO] DNSSEC enabled for 2 zones, DS records published, validated from multiple resolvers
- [INFO] Updated on-call playbook for final on-prem cutover procedures

### Events
- Start-of-month migration push: onboarded 16 zones, including several with complex SRV and CAA sets; parity tests passed.
- Applied TTL harmonization across 12 zones to 1800 seconds; coordinated with app owners and logged approvals.
- Ran DNSSEC enablement for 2 zones previously unsigned; published DS records and validated from multiple resolvers.
- Updated on-call playbook to include step-by-step for final on-prem cutover (freeze updates, AXFR snapshot, final serial bump, delegation switch).

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: A. Lee. 1 pages. 8 tickets. Status: Stable; migration continues with standardized TTLs and expanding DNSSEC coverage.
